title: Anti-aging Snail Cream, Crema De Caracol,
description:
The healing properties of Bella-Eterna Anti-Aging CreamTM were discovered simply by accident. In 1980, the Bascun family built a breeding farm of ground snails in Chile, South America. While handling the snails, farmers observed that their hands became extremely soft and small injuries caused by handling snail cages quickly healed, avoiding infection or leaving noticeable scars. 

Intrigued by the snails' therapeutic attributes, Dr. Fernando Bascun Ygualt, a student of medicine, led a rigorous scientific research of ground snail extract "Helix Aspersa Mller." Laboratory studies confirmed the regenerative and healing properties of this extract used by the snail to regenerate its skin and shell when damaged. Close analysis of the extract revealed the following ingredients and properties in natural form:

description: "...definitely the best moisturizer I have ever used. I am telling you'll you got to get this miracle worker" - Jennifer D Rhames 9.29.13Who wants to have youthful skin?As we get older our skin loses essential components like hyaluronic acid, elastin and collagen which are crucial in maintaining the elasticity and firmness of skin. You can help reduce the rate of this loss in one of two ways: needles injecting these components or using a topical cream which is non-invasive.If you are not in favor of needles, then Glowzone Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Matrixyl 3000 can assist. This is a non-irritating skin rejuvenation cream containing a patented pentapeptide known to significantly improve the appearance of facial wrinkles, stretch marks and minor skin imperfections.
